Implementation plan:
1. Added `repoWriteQueues` Map keyed by resolved repo path
2. Added `withWriteSerialization<T>()` promise-chain queue (same pattern as bd.ts but without OS-level locks)
3. Added `execWrite()` wrapper that routes through serialization
4. Changed 6 write operations (newKnot, claimKnot, pollKnot, updateKnot, addEdge, removeEdge) to use execWrite
5. Left 5 read operations (listKnots, listProfiles, listWorkflows, showKnot, listEdges) on unserialized exec
6. Exported _pendingWriteCount() test helper
7. Added 5 tests in knots-write-serialization.test.ts verifying serialization, concurrent reads, mixed read/write, cleanup, and error recovery
